data.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake Achievements
data.meta_description: This game does not currently have any achievements. The achievements will be listed here as soon as they are released.
data.text:
Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake achievements will appear here when available.

In the meantime, you could always check out the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake trophy list on TrueTrophies

Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake Store Description

Pre-order and receive the Back to the Origins Set.

The Prince has returned! Experience the classic tale that redefined action-adventure gaming in this full-scale remake for a new generation.

- You are the Prince of Persia. Embark on a journey to save your kingdom from the treacherous Vizier.

- Master the Sands of Time and use your dagger to reverse, accelerate, freeze, and slow time itself.

- Fight cursed enemies and solve puzzles along the way.

- Experience incredible graphical enhancements and re-designed gameplay mechanics.

- Unlock Prince of Persia, the original game from 1989, along your journey.

Hide ads
